body: last story is MVP for this ...
The last story's giving me "Domestic Girlfriend" vibes . . . .
translations please i want to die
Well, de jure, it's still disallowed. So they have to settle for de facto polygamy then. :)

Honestly, if they're all getting along THAT well as a triangle, they might as well just become polygamous at that point. Strictly speaking, the reason polygamy tends to fall apart is almost always jealousy, or lack of stamina and the mental fortitude required to please two people at once, be they man or woman. Well, it's Hentai, so they could get away with anything, for example...the guy not going soft after cumming like a dozen times. It just feels like if the author was going to go to all that trouble making them literally perfect, should have just finished it off and gone the whole way with it. I mean, this is nice too, it just bugged me in the back of my head the entire last story. Kind of distracting when you're going at it.
I like the last story the most but I preferred the blonde though lol
I loved the final story a lot but....I lost my shit at the baby. Whoever drew that, it's funny as hell.
